paper_abstract: In a FOCS 1990 paper, S. Irani proved that the First-Fit online algorithm for coloring a graph uses at most O(k log n) colors for k-inductive graphs. In this note we provide a very short proof of this fact. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on the online First-Fit algorithm for coloring k-inductive graphs
